name: 2D and 3D Godot: Game 03
description:
This is the third video game in the project 2D and 3D game development with Godot. Students need to create a 3D platformer game with some obstacles and a scoring system.

Max's score is 80. points, awarded when moving through and over obstacles.

Be patient when the game initializes for the first time.

Video tutorial about making games in the project and more.

Learn to make commercial video games with Godot

Commands:

left arrow - move left right arrow - move right double space tap - double jump energize jump - move left, move right, run

Previously presented games from the learning project:

Game 01 ball-type

Game 02 2D turn-based adventure with platformer elements

Enjoy!
